channel.title: gtk4 on SoBo's Dev Log
channel.description: Recent content in gtk4 on SoBo's Dev Log

item.title: Swatch: a color palette manager
item.description: Between one thing and the other, I found myself in need for a palette manager: something to let me categorize different palettes and easily pick and name colors depending on their use.

item.title: Gtk4, LibAdwaita and the new Feeds
item.description: So, something big is coming for my news reader app Feeds. Most of this year, as far as personal projects go, I spent at close contact with Gtk4, libadwaita and the awesome people over at the various matrix chat rooms.
